nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Runebook\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Tracks a counter for each \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Runic\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}]}","{\"text\":\"mob killed while in your accessory\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"bag or inventory.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Increase rarity and gain \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"+1☯\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Runecrafting Wisdom \",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"},{\"text\":\"for each digit\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"on the counter. \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"(Max 4 digits)\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Counter: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"None yet!\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON ACCESSORY\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"RUNEBOOK"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
